full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Jeff DATE 7/26/17 TIME 2:45 P.M. M David OF PHONE/MOBILE 220-511-5555 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL WILL CALL AGAIN CAME TO SEE YOU RUSH WANTS TO SEE YOU SPECIAL ATTENTION RETURNED YOUR CALL MESSAGE Did you want her to follow up on anything? text_blocks.content: Did you want her to follow up on anything?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scan of four 'Important Message' forms, likely from a office setting. The forms contain handwritten notes and phone numbers. The document is dated 07/26/17 and has a Public Records Request number stamped on it.
